title: Green and gold eye makeup look for the festive season
text:
Your eyes are the first thing a person notices in you. So why not serve an extra dose of green goodness with a touch of gold this Diwali. We bring you an extremely easy way to do your eyes so you can turn heads in style wherever you go. This green-gold makeup look is subtle yet ultra-glam and can be worn on any occasion. Whether you want to step out for a puja or set the temparature soaring in a house party, put on this eye makeup look and be festive-ready in no time. Watch this video to know the ste-by-step way to ace this look.

Next Story : 9 ethnic styles you should try this festive season
description: We bring you an extremely easy way to do your eyes so you can turn heads in style wherever you go in this green and gold eye makeup loo.
